mapper.select: select * from reply where bd_id = #{bd_id} order by writedate
mapper.insert: insert into reply(re_num, bd_id, user_id, comment1) values(nextval(re_seq), #{bd_id}, #{user_id}, #{comment1})
mapper.update: update reply set comment1 = #{comment1}, updatedate = concat('(수정됨)',date_format(sysdate(),'%Y. %m. %d. %T')) where re_num = #{re_num}
